title: Council Decision of 4 June 2009 appointing one Dutch member of the Committee of the Regions
header:
11.6.2009 EN Official Journal of the European Union C 132/2
COUNCIL DECISION
of 4 June 2009
appointing one Dutch member of the Committee of the Regions
2009/C 132/02
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty establishing the European Community, and in particular Article 263 thereof,
Having regard to the proposal of the Dutch Government,
Whereas:
(1) On 24 January 2006, the Council adopted Decision 2006/116/EC appointing the members and alternate members of the Committee of the Regions for the period from 26 January 2006 to 25 January 2010 (1).
(2) A member's seat on the Committee of the Regions has become vacant following the resignation of Mr Ivo OPSTELTEN,
main_body:
The following is hereby appointed to the Committee of the Regions as a member for the remainder of the current term of office, which runs until 25 January 2010:
Mr Ahmed ABOUTALEB, Burgemeester van Rotterdam (mayor of Rotterdam).
This Decision shall take effect on the day of its adoption.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 4 June 2009.
For the Council
The President
Martin PECINA
(1)  OJ L 56, 25.2.2006, p. 75.
